262                 FROM nodes n_target
263                 JOIN edges e ON e.target = n_target.id
264                 JOIN nodes n_src ON e.source = n_src.id

266                     n_target.name IN ({name_placeholders}) 
267                     OR n_target.id IN ({name_placeholders})
268                     OR ({node_suffix_clause})
269                 )
270                 {type_clause}
271                 
272                 UNION
273                 
274                 -- Match directly on edge target (fallback for undefined target nodes)
275                 SELECT n_src.path
276                 FROM edges e
277                 JOIN nodes n_src ON e.source = n_src.id
278                 WHERE (
279                     e.target IN ({name_placeholders})
280                     OR ({edge_suffix_clause})

283             )
